title: Studio Apartment -- 7616 S. South Shore Dr.
posting_body: ['The Doral Apartments on South Shore Drive-7616 S. South Shore Drive is a  five story brick elevated building.', 'This great South Shore neighborhood location is within walking distance to Lake Michigan and nearby public transportation.', 'In Addition, it has a gated parking lot with assigned spots available for lesee monthly rental.', 'Newly decorated apartments includes stove, refrigerator, A/C,  blinds, FREE HEAT, and FREE COOKING GAS.', '$625-$650   STUDIO', '$775   1 BEDROOM APARTMENT', '$40 Application Fee.          $350 Move-In Fee after application is approved - (no security deposit.)', 'If you would like to set up an appointment please call:', 'KALABICH MANAGEMENT (708) 424-4216', 'Hours:  Monday through Friday 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m', 'Saturdays from 8:00 a.m. until 12:00 noon.', 'You can also check us out on Facebook, our website <URL>, or Twitter (@KalabichMgmt).']
